testcase.name: testSearch
testcase.error:
org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: ### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00907: missing right parenthesis
### The error may exist in org/zerock/mapper/BoardMapper.xml ### The error may involve defaultParameterMap ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: select bno,title,content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where rownum <= ? * ?) where ( title like '%'||?||'%' title like '%'||?||'%' ) AND rownum <= ? * ? ) where rn > (? -1) * ? ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00907: missing right parenthesis
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00907: missing right parenthesis
